Sentencas: Dependence of total conductivity with temperature and pO(2) exhibits a typical p-type semiconducting behaviour.
Titulo: Characterization of La2-xSrxCoTiO6 (0.6 ≤ x ≤ 1.0) series as new cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Results show that the higher the Sr content, the higher holes (Co3+) concentration and consequently, La2-xSrxCoTiO6 (x = 1.0) shows the highest conductivity (13.23 S/cm at 1073 K in air).
Titulo: Characterization of La2-xSrxCoTiO6 (0.6 ≤ x ≤ 1.0) series as new cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The negligible reactivity with YSZ, used as the electrolyte, of symmetrical cells under oxidant conditions and the moderate thermal expansion found by XRD point to their possible use as SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Characterization of La2-xSrxCoTiO6 (0.6 ≤ x ≤ 1.0) series as new cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, La2-xSrxCoTiO6-based cathodes display polarization resistance of 0.9 Omega cm(2) at 1073 K in oxygen, only slightly above than the current state-of-the-art.
